name: HubSpot
headline: Front end development on a powerful content management system used by thousands every day.
paragraphs: I worked as a front-end software engineer on HubSpot's CMS team both as a co-op and in a full-time capacity. While at HubSpot, a made a variety of improvements to their Pages CMS dashboard, rebuilt their template picking too from the ground up, and wrote an extensive automated test suite for their drag-and-drop CMS editor.

head.title: HubSpot - Camden Phalen
head.description: Front end development on a powerful content management system used by thousands every day.
